original: Löf, Nils Tage, kyrkoherde, Bottna-ryd, f. 18/10/99 i Agnetorp, Skarab. 1., av P. J. L. o. Elin Sigrid Svensson. G. 30’ m. Astrid Lindström. Barn: Berit f. 31, Ulla 32, Per-Ake 36, Inger 38, Gerd 40, Nils-Göran 43, Bo-Christer 45, Lars-Håkan 46. — Stud:ex, i Gbg 18, teol. kand. i Lund 27, prästv. f. Skara stift 28. Kommin. i Bjur-bäck 28, kyrkoh. i Bottnaryd sed. 32. Ordf. i kyrkoråd, kyrkost., past:kyr-koråd, past :kyrko’St., boställsstyr., skolråd, led. av barnav:nd, stiftsndns led. i femte boställsdistr. ÖM i Odd Fellow-logen III Vapensmeden i Jön-köp.
translated: Löf, Nils Tage, clergyman, Bottna-ryd, b. 18/10/99 in Agnetorp, Skarab. County, son of P.J.L. and Elin Sigrid Svensson. Married in 1930 to Astrid Lindström. Children: Berit b. 1931, Ulla b. 1932, Per-Ake b. 1936, Inger b. 1938, Gerd b. 1940, Nils-Göran b. 1943, Bo-Christer b. 1945, Lars-Håkan b. 1946. Completed secondary school in Gothenburg in 1918, graduated in theology from Lund University in 1927, ordained as a priest for the Diocese of Skara in 1928. Was a curate in Bjur-bäck from 1928, became the vicar of Bottnaryd in 1932. Served as chairman of the church council, church trustee, past church council chairman, past trustee, member of the housing committee, school council, member of the child welfare board, and member of the fifth housing district council of the Independent Order of Odd Fellows III Vapensmeden in Jönköping.

memberOf.name: Fifth Housing District Council of the Independent Order of Odd Fellows III Vapensmeden in Jön-köping
